title: Try out the new Best Ever Lay's and celebrate with us! - News | Khaleej Times
text: How Dubai Police will catch traffic violations in residential areas | Khaleej Times Lay's UAE set a new Guinness World Record with the tallest crisp packet structure made entirely out of Lay's packs. And that's not all - say hello to the new Best Ever Lay’s with more intense flavor and the perfect crunch! Now in premium packaging. In the UAE, every year, we receive thousands of new cars ready to be picked up by their eager new owners. However, before the car is handed over to the buyer, each of these cars embark on a meticulous journey of preparation.
